Tweet Text:
Old joke about agnostic technologists building artificial super intelligence to find out if there’s a God.

They finally finish & ask the question.

AI replies: “There is now, mfs!!”
Translated Text:
老笑话关于不可知论技术人员建立人工超级智能来找出是否有上帝。

他们终于完成并问了这个问题。

人工智能回答：“现在有了，mfs！！”

Tweet Text: I’m old enough to remember https://t.co/q7uY7rhEY4

Starting April 15th, only verified accounts will be eligible to be in For You recommendations.

The is the only realistic way to address advanced AI bot swarms taking over. It is otherwise a hopeless losing battle.

Voting in polls will require verification for same reason.
Translated Text: 从4月15日开始，只有经过验证的账户才有资格进入“为您推荐”。这是应对先进的AI机器人群体控制局面的唯一现实方式，否则就是一场无望的持续失败的战斗。参与民意调查将需要经过验证，出于同样的原因。
